title: "The Sound of Music" promotional illustration
content:
Photo for reference:

[http://www.acappellanews.com/images/soundofmusic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090129/http:/www.acappellanews.com/images/soundofmusic.jpg)

I have searched several sites including Identifont, DaFont, and Type Navigator looking for the script font. The closest I've found is Ballantines Script Medium. The problem lies in the "o".

As for the bold, non-script font, I have no idea.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Cataylo
author: cataylo

comments.content:
I believe the reason for your difficulty is that the lettering is probably hand-drawn, but the large letters are rather like Pink Broccoli's [Hideaway](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090129/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/pink-broccoli/hideaway/). You could probably use any of several formal scripts in place of the script used here and no one would notice the switch.

- Mike Yanega
